# ActivitiesController.EditActivity method

Edits an existing activity.

```csharp
public Task<IActionResult> EditActivity(Guid id, Activity activity)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| id | The ID of the activity to be edited. |
| activity | The updated activity details. |

## Return Value

An IActionResult representing the result of the action.
